TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DATADIR extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction of the data flow in the `dwDirection` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.EnumFormatEtc%2A> method. This determines the formats that the resulting enumerator can enumerate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DATADIR DATADIR_GET = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Requests that <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.EnumFormatEtc%2A> supply an enumerator for the formats that can be specified in <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.DATADIR DATADIR_SET = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Requests that <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.EnumFormatEtc%2A> supply an enumerator for the formats that can be specified in <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.SetData%2A>.
